reviewText: i do not think worth paying over 10 dollars for that for sure, but also it was done pretty cheat. I like it, but i love anything about Jesus just about.

"Jesus, The Word Became Flesh" is one of ten in The Footprints of God series created by Stephen Ray.  Seven are available at this time, and the series is scheduled to be completed in 2010.  Each of these DVD's is exciting and informative.

This DVD takes you through the life of Jesus.  What a blessing to feel like you are actually visiting the places where Jesus walked.  Many of us will never be able to visit the Holy Land and I thank Stephen Ray for taking us on an incredible journey.

Walk along the Jordan River, see the land where Jesus lived and taught.  Go with him to Jerusalem and walk the Way of the Cross.  Visit the many beautiful churches built on the holy places like the Transfiguration, Ascension, Birth of Jesus and more.

I learned a lot watching this documentary and the others in the series, and I plan on viewing them a second time to really soak in everything.  There is so much information, and they make scripture come alive!  Hearing the readings at Mass I feel I now better understand what is being read.
arrived quickly we love the series

love this series . i use them for CCD class 6th grade they kids love the reality of the places the biblical relationships of old and new testament.. those some art work in not recommend for this age group - those segments can be avoided. Stephen Ray is a funny guy the kids like him alot.
I would rather have this than something from Hollywood.  very educational documentary and the truth.  I recommend this to all.
I love the way it is being presented by Stephen Ray and also the way he has referenced where to find answers in the books
i learned alot about the places the Jesus walked. I like Stephen Ray. Please make more of these movies. i love it
Stephen Ray does an incredible job with this series.  We use it to teach adult faith formation, as well as teaching our older (teen-age) children.  Excellent resource and very well done.
I can not say enough great things about Steve Ray and this wonderful DVD about the life of Jesus!!!  Make sure to buy and watch the other DVD's as well.
Pretty good film. Liked the various scenes and explanations in various parts of the film. Not something i won't forget however.

Steve Ray takes us on a real biblical adventure in this centerpiece film in his award-winning Footprints of God series. With his effective storytelling and "Jerusalem Jones" persona, Ray literally walks us through the places and stories in the life of Christ. The stunning cinematography and "man on the street" narration brings the New Testament stories to life. From the youngest children to the most devout adult, everyone will find much to enjoy in this film. It's a great combination of documentary and travelogue adventure. With humor and great passion, Ray's enthusiasm for the greatest story ever told will give you new appreciation for your faith. I highly recommend all of Ray's Footprints of God films. Jesus: The Word Became Flesh is a great place to start your own bible adventure. Paul: Contending for the Faith - DVD Footprints of God Peter: The Keeper of the Keys - DVD Footprints of God Moses: Signs, Sacracments, Salvation - DVD Footprints of God

I have re-watched this dvd several times. It is wonderful, teaching things about Jesus Christ and the Holy Land I never knew. Wonderful teaching. Whether you are Catholic or not-If you love Jesus Christ you will love this dvd. Steven Ray has done a really excellent job. I will give this one for gifts for those who want to know more and we all do.
